extDescription.message: Displays map of the current website to aid in navigation.

navigationDescription.message: , requested $NUM$ times.  Loaded in an average of $LOAD$ miliseconds.
navigationDescription.description: The message posted in the popup for each stored navigation.

NUM.example: 4 (The number of times this URL was accessed.)

inHandler.description: Notification displayed for each webNavigation event.

inHandlerError.description: Notification displayed in a webNavigation event handler without data!

errorCommittedWithoutPending.message: Wha?  `onCommitted` for `%s` called, though it's not pending: %o
errorCommittedWithoutPending.description: Error logged when `onCommitted` is triggered on a non-pending request.

errorCompletedWithoutPending.message: Wha?  `onCompleted` for `%s` called, though it's not pending: %o
errorCompletedWithoutPending.description: Error logged when `onCompleted` is triggered on a non-pending request.

errorErrorOccurredWithoutPending.message: Wha?  `onErrorOccurred` for `%s` called, though it's not pending: %o
errorErrorOccurredWithoutPending.description: Error logged when `onErrorOccurred` is triggered on a non-pending request.
